comment: Good idea for a poll thanks to a left-winger who wants to "Smash Islamophobia", the fake word they created to stop criticism of Islam. Let's see how racially diverse Gab is. What race are you?
amr:
# ::snt Good idea for a poll thanks to a left-winger who wants to "Smash Islamophobia", the fake word they created to stop criticism of Islam. Let's see how racially diverse Gab is. What race are you?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / idea
            :ARG1-of (g / good-02)
            :purpose (p / poll-01)
            :ARG1-of (t / thank-01
                  :ARG2 (w / want-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :ARG1-of (l / left-19)
                              :ARG0-of w
                              :ARG1 (s / smear-02
                                    :ARG1 (r / religious-group
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Islamophobia"))
                                    :ARG2 (w2 / word
                                          :ARG1-of (f / fake-02)
                                          :ARG1-of (c / create-01
                                                :ARG0 p2
                                                :purpose (s2 / stop-01
                                                      :ARG0 w2
                                                      :ARG1 (c2 / criticize-01
                                                            :ARG1 (r2 / religious-group
                                                                  :name (n2 / name
                                                                        :op1 "Islam")))))))
                              :ARG0-of s))))
      :snt2 (s3 / see-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (w3 / we)
            :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                  :degree-of (d / diverse
                        :mod (r3 / race)
                        :domain (e / ethnic-group
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Gab")))))
      :snt3 r3
      :domain (y / you)
      :mod (a / amr-unknown))

comment: Use kinder words so you can open discussion with those who disagree. It is not good to live in an echo chamber. Go out into the world.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (u / use-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w / word
                  :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                        :ARG2 (k / kind-01
                              :ARG1 w)
                        :ARG3 (m2 / more)))
            :purpose (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (o / open-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (d / discuss-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (d2 / disagree-01))))))
      :snt2 (g / good-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (l / live-01
                  :location (c / chamber
                        :ARG0-of (e / echo-01))))
      :snt3 (g2 / go-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG4 (w2 / world)
            :direction (o2 / out)))
